iati-activity.title: Plan: DFID WASH Results Fund
iati-activity.description: WaterAid on target earning potential is 6.7million of DFID funding (through a subcontract with Plan UK) from April 2014 to March 2018 to deliver sustainable sanitation and hygiene results to 300,000 people in Pakistan and 250,000 people in Bangladesh Clean water will also be provided to about 10% of the beneficiaries who do not have adequate water to be able to practice good hygiene. There will be a small management and contingency element in the UK This programme is a results based contract which means that WaterAid will only receive payment by results (PbR) upon successful delivery of independently verified outputs and outcomes. The initial outputs – by Dec 2015) will be: 1. people with new/improved latrines 2. people trained in hygiene and 3. people provided with clean water The later outcomes – by March 2018 - will be: How many people continuing to use their new/improved latrines; How many people continuing to wash their hands with soap and; How many people continuing to be access clean water

contact-info.mailing-address: Open data at WaterAid, 47-49 Durham Street, London, SE11 5JD, UK
